artist: Macklemore & Ryan Lewis Featuring Mary Lambert

chunked_vad.lyrics_text: When I was in the 3rd grade I thought that I was gay 'cause I could draw My uncle was and I kept my room straight I told my mom, tears rushing down my face, she's like "Ben you've loved girls since before pre-K"
